bg-layout.description: The default background color of the interface.

bg-elevated.description: The background color for elements with a different height than the interface, such as a dialog box, tooltip, or drop-down menu.

bg-container.description: The background color for elements with the highest level of prominence, like a card.

bg-mask.description: The background color of the mask, used to cover the content below the mask. Modal, Drawer and other components use this token.

bg-interactive.description: The background color of contained elements with a smaller surface area, like a button.

bg-container-subtle.description: The background color for elements with a secondary level of prominence.

bg-interactive-hover.description: The hover state color of contained elements with a smaller surface area, like a button.

bg-interactive-selected.description: The selected state color of contained elements with a smaller surface area, like a button or checkbox.

bg-interactive-selected-hover.description: The hover state color of selected contained elements with a smaller surface area, like a button.

bg-container-inverse.description: The background color for elements that should stand out in the interface.

bg-container-subtlest.description: The background color for elements with a tertiary level of prominence.

bg-brand.description: The background color of main actions, like primary buttons.

bg-brand-hover.description: The hover state color of main actions, like primary buttons.

bg-brand-active.description: The active state (on press) color of main actions, like primary buttons.

bg-brand-subtlest.description: Use for the background of elements used to reinforce our brand, but with less emphasis.

bg-brand-subtle.description: Use for the background of elements used to reinforce our brand, but with less emphasis.

bg-brand-selected.description: The selected state color of main actions, like primary buttons.

bg-danger.description: Use for backgrounds communicating critical information on elements with a smaller surface area, like a badge or a banner.

bg-danger-hover.description: The hover state color for communicating critical information on elements with a smaller surface area.

bg-danger-active.description: The active state (on press) color for communicating critical information on elements with a smaller surface area.

bg-danger-subtlest.description: Use for backgrounds communicating critical information on elements with a smaller surface area, with a tertiary level of prominence.

bg-danger-subtle.description: Use for backgrounds communicating critical information on elements with a smaller surface area, with a secondary level of prominence.

bg-danger-selected.description: The selected state color for communicating critical information on elements with a smaller surface area.

bg-warning.description: Use for backgrounds communicating warning on elements with a smaller surface area, like a badge or a banner.

bg-warning-hover.description: The hover state color for communicating warning on elements with a smaller surface area.

bg-warning-active.description: The active state (on press) color for communicating warning on elements with a smaller surface area.

bg-warning-subtlest.description: Use for backgrounds communicating warning on elements with a smaller surface area, with a tertiary level of prominence.

bg-warning-subtle.description: Use for backgrounds communicating warning on elements with a smaller surface area, with a secondary level of prominence.

bg-success.description: Use for backgrounds communicating success on elements with a smaller surface area, like a badge or a banner.

bg-success-hover.description: The hover state color for communicating success on elements with a smaller surface area.

bg-success-active.description: The active state (on press) color for communicating success on elements with a smaller surface area.

bg-success-subtlest.description: Use for backgrounds communicating success on elements with a smaller surface area, with a tertiary level of prominence.

bg-success-subtle.description: Use for backgrounds communicating success on elements with a smaller surface area, with a secondary level of prominence.

bg-info.description: Use for backgrounds communicating important information on elements with a smaller surface area, like a badge or button.

bg-info-hover.description: The hover state color for communicating important information on elements with a smaller surface area.

bg-info-active.description: The active state (on press) color for communicating important information on elements with a smaller surface area.

bg-info-subtlest.description: Use for backgrounds communicating important information on elements with a smaller surface area, with a tertiary level of prominence.

bg-info-subtle.description: Use for backgrounds communicating important information on elements with a smaller surface area, with a secondary level of prominence.

bg-discovery.description: The background color of suggested items to discover, such as a badge or banner.

bg-discovery-hover.description: The hover state color for suggested items to discover, such as a badge or banner.

bg-discovery-active.description: The active state (on press) color for suggested items to discover, such as a badge or banner.

bg-discovery-subtlest.description: Use for backgrounds suggesting items to discover, with a tertiary level of prominence.

bg-discovery-subtle.description: Use for backgrounds suggesting items to discover, with a secondary level of prominence.

border-primary.description: The default color for borders on any element.

border-secondary.description: The color for hr elements or any visual dividers.

border-primary-hover.description: The hover color for borders on any element.

border-brand.description: Use for borders paired with brand colors.

border-brand-hover.description: The hover color for borders paired with brand colors.

border-brand-subtlest.description: Use for the border of elements used to reinforce our brand, but with less emphasis.

border-info-active.description: The active state (on press) color for borders communicating information.

border-info-subtlest.description: Use for the border of elements communicating information, but with less emphasis.

border-info-subtle.description: Use for the border of elements communicating information, but with less emphasis.

border-discovery.description: Use for borders communicating discovery information.

border-discovery-subtle.description: Use for the border of elements communicating discovery information, but with less emphasis.

text-description.description: Use for text with a secondary level of prominence.

text-placeholder.description: Use for text indicating placeholder on elements with a smaller surface area, like an input.

text-inverse.description: Use for text on dark background.

text-brand-hover.description: The hover state color for text links.

text-brand-active.description: The active state (on press) color for text links.

text-brand-inverse.description: Use for text on bg-brand, like primary buttons.

text-brand-strong.description: Use for text on bg-brand-subtle and subtles, like badge and alert.

text-danger-hover.description: The hover state color for text communicating critical information.

text-danger-active.description: The active state (on press) color for text communicating critical information.

text-danger-strong.description: Use for text on bg-danger-subtle and subtles, like badge and alert.

text-success-hover.description: The hover state color for text communicating success.

text-success-active.description: The active state (on press) color for text communicating success.

text-success-strong.description: Use for text on bg-success-subtle and subtles, like badge and alert.

icon-active.description: The active state (on press) color for icons.

icon-inverse.description: Use for icon on dark background.

icon-brand.description: Use for icons that need to pull more focus.

icon-brand-hover.description: The hover color for icons that need to pull more focus.

icon-brand-active.description: The active state (on press) color for icons that need to pull more focus.

icon-brand-strong.description: Use for icon on bg-brand-subtle and subtles, like badge and alert.

width-9.description: The width of the basic controls such as icon buttons and toggle.

height-9.description: The height of the basic controls such as buttons and input boxes.

radius.description: Border radius of base components like buttons and inputs.

radius-sm.description: Small size border radius, used in small size components, such as Checkbox and Segmented.

radius-lg.description: Large size border radius, used in some large components, such as Card, Modal and other components.

radius-full.description: Use for having the maximum possible border radius.

radius-none.description: Equates to `0`. Use for resetting default border radius styles.

space-0.description: Equates to `0`. Use for resetting default spacing styles.

space-1.description: Use for small and compact pieces of UI.

space-2.description: Use for small and compact pieces of UI.

space-3.description: Use for small and compact pieces of UI.

space-4.description: Use for larger and less dense pieces of UI.

space-8.description: Use for larger and less dense pieces of UI.

space-12.description: Use for larger and less dense pieces of UI.

space-16.description: Use for larger and less dense pieces of UI.

space-20.description: Use for the largest pieces of UI and for layout elements.

space-24.description: Use for the largest pieces of UI and for layout elements.

space-28.description: Use for the largest pieces of UI and for layout elements.

space-32.description: Use for the largest pieces of UI and for layout elements.
